mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, nickname, password) VALUES (#{username}, #{nickname}, #{password})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM users WHERE username = #{value})

select u.*, ur.name as "role.name", ur.display_name as "role.displayName", ui.id as "image.id", ui.url as "image.url", ui.public_id as "image.publicId" from users u join user_roles ur on u.role_id = ur.id left join user_images ui on u.image_id = ui.id where u.id = #{id}

SELECT u.*, ur.name as "role.name", ur.display_name as "role.displayName", ui.id as "image.id", ui.url as "image.url", ui.public_id as "image.publicId" FROM users u join user_roles ur on u.role_id = ur.id LEFT JOIN user_images ui ON u.image_id = ui.id WHERE u.username = #{username}
